title: Edit and delete suite/case functionality
description: Complete the CRUD loop by implementing edit and delete for both suites and cases. Include confirmation dialogs for destructive actions.
acceptance_criteria: Edit suite: /suites/[id]/edit page with pre-filled form
Edit case: modal/slide-over with pre-filled form
Delete suite: confirmation dialog, then DELETE
Delete case: confirmation dialog, then DELETE
After delete, navigate appropriately and invalidate cache
implementation_notes: Reuse SuiteForm and CaseForm with mode='edit'
ConfirmDialog should accept title, message, confirmLabel, onConfirm
Consider 'danger' button style for destructive confirm
